title: How to Make Oven Barbecued Pork Chops

steps.headline: Spray a baking dish or casserole dish with nonstick cooking spray.
Add pork chops, as many that you need for your planned meal, then top with sliced onion and lemon.
Top with brown sugar, figure about a tablespoon per chop, or as sweet as you like them.
Dollop ketchup, to taste, over pork chops.
Bake until the pork chops are tender, about 2 hours.

text: Preheat oven to 375 °F (190 °C).  Spray a baking dish or casserole dish with nonstick cooking spray.  Add pork chops, as many that you need for your planned meal, then top with sliced onion and lemon.  Top with brown sugar, figure about a tablespoon per chop, or as sweet as you like them.  Dollop ketchup, to taste, over pork chops.  Bake until the pork chops are tender, about 2 hours.
